name: Untitled Norse Game
description: Are you ready to defend yourself and your town during the beginning of ragnarok. Your time is now. Welcome to Untitled Norse Game a 2D action platformer, where you fight your way through levels and beat your score with the best time. You fight with a few different class types to help fight against the undead attacking your village. You can parkour around the levels and attack from a distance, or up close and personal. Who know what else is lurking at the end of the line to fight.  Choose from a set of different weapons! Bow and arrow to attack at a long distance, sword to deal big upclose damage or the dagger to move and attack faster. Defeat different enemies from agile archers, to tough warriors and sneaking thieves. Jump, run and climb through the levels and dont step on the hot lava.
